attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The royal family and their hangers-on are a constant financial drain on our society. They contribute nothing positive to the country that could not be done by a democratically elected head of state, at a fraction of the cost. I urge you to initiate laws to seize 'their' assets and to remove them from their positions in society. Think of the good uses that the money saved could be put to. They are an anachronism and action is long over-due.

rejection.details: Perhaps changing "liquidate" to "disestablish" would make it clear that this is a petition calling for the founding of a republic.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
